name: 11 inch laptop sleeve, MacBook 11 sleeve, MacBook Air 11 cover, MacBook 11 Air
description:
This padded cover is designed to fit Mac Book 11 or any other 11 inch Laptop. 

MATERIAL USED
I have made this Mac Book Air 11 sleeve using 100% cotton material, soft foam padding, with cotton string and wooden button for closure. Plain from back side.

MEASUREMENTS
Measurement of the sleeve is 9 inches X 13 inches

DEVICE PROTECTION
The cover will protect your Laptop from dust and scratches. Spot clean recommended.

name: Macbook 13 Cover
description:
This cover is for Mac Book Air 13 or any other 13 inch Laptop. 
Can be made for Mac Book 15, Mac Book 11. 

MATERIAL USED
13 inch laptop case is made with 100% cotton material, soft foam padding, with cotton string and wood button for closure. Soft cotton material is used for inner lining.

SIZE
Size of the sleeve is 11 inches X 14.50 inches

LAPTOP PROTECTION
The 13 inch cover will protect your Laptop or Mac Book from dust and scratches. Spot clean recommended.

CUSTOM ORDER
This Laptop Case can be custom made for any other device.
Custom orders are welcome.

SHIPMENT
Your order will be shipped by registered air mail with tracking number.

name: 15 inch Laptop Sleeve
description:
This cover is designed to fit Mac Book 15 or any other 15 inch Laptop. 
Printed double pocket at the front while plain at the back.

Can be made for Mac Book 13, Mac Book 11 or any other device. 

MATERIAL USED
Made with 100% cotton material, soft foam padding, with cotton string and wood button for closure. Soft cotton material is used for inner lining.

MEASUREMENTS
Measurement of the Macbook sleeve is 13 inches X 16 inches

DEVICE PROTECTION
The laptop cover will protect your gadget from dust and scratches. Spot clean recommended.

CUSTOM ORDER
This Laptop Sleeve can be custom made for any device.
Custom orders are welcome.

SHIPMENT
Your order will be shipped by registered air mail with tracking number.

I have made this macbook cover with passion, hope you will like it too!

NOTE
Print placement may vary a little.

name: iPad Sleeve with Embroidered Birds
description:
iPad Cover, iPad 2 3 Case, 10 inch Tablet Sleeve, Padded Nook Cover, Embroidered Pocket, Nexus10 Case ,10 inch Tablets, Handmade iPad Sleeve, Father's Day Gift.

MATERIAL USED
This sleeve is made with 100% cotton material, soft foam padding, with a cotton string and wooden button for closure. 

UNIQUE FEATURE
The hand embroidered pattern at the front of the iPad case makes it unique and a pocket at the back can be used for cell phone or other items. 

COLOR
Colors of fabric are Beige and Dark Brown. I have used fast color threads for embroidery.

MEASUREMENTS
Measurement of the sleeve is 8.25 inches X 11 inches

DEVICE PROTECTION
The cover will protect your iPad from dust and scratches. Spot clean recommended.

name: iPad Cover
description:
This exclusive hand embroidered iPad Case is perfect for a gift. Soft materials are used to keep it safe from scratches. iPad will snuggly fit and can be kept in another bag or carried as it is.

The iPad sleeve is made with 100% cotton material, soft foam padding, with a string and wooden button for closure. 

iPad sleeve measures 8.5 inches X 11 inches

UNIQUE FEATURE
The hand embroidered Butterfly at the front of the iPad case makes it unique and attractive. I have used fast color threads for embroidery.

The cover will protect your iPad from dust and scratches. Spot clean recommended.
